summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5458 for the improvement of 34th Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to a point 280 feet, more or less, north of West Ray Street; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 69199, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
